page.title: 13FARMING
page.content:
{FINKELY MANOR FARM
{ Finkely Manor Farm}is owned by Mr Dance and the manager is Mr Sterling. It has{1400}acres of crops and grazing land and another{200}acres of woodland.There are nine men employed on the farm not including Mr Dance and Mr Sterling.They have{200}dairy{,100 single suckling beef cows and {700}stock cows. They grow nine different crops on the farm.The crops are Winter Wheat,Winter Barley, Vinning Peas,Spring Barley,Potatoes, Grass seed,Forage Maze,Grazing grass,Cale.They have{10}working tractors and{2}combine harvesters.
